text: The Norfolk and Western K1,K2 and K3 Class 4-8-2 were a class of 48 American 4-8-2 type steam locomotives built between 1916 and 1926 for the Norfolk and Western Railroad to pull passenger trains and heavy freight trains . All of them were scrapped by the 1940’s and 50’s . After they were replaced by the Norfolk and Western J Class 4-8-4 (1941) during World War 2 they were scrapped ether from crashes or used as spare parts to built new locomotives.
title: Norfolk and Western K Class 4-8-2
